org.daisy.streamline.api.validity

Class ValidatorFactoryMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.streamline.api.validity.ValidatorFactoryMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValidatorFactoryMakerService

    public class ValidatorFactoryMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValidatorFactoryMakerService
    Simple factory for instantiating a Validator based on one of its identifiers.

      • ValidatorFactoryMaker

        public ValidatorFactoryMaker()
        Creates a new empty instance. This method is public because it is required by OSGi. In an SPI context, use newInstance()

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static ValidatorFactoryMaker newInstance()

        Creates a new ValidatorFactoryMaker and populates it using the SPI (java service provider interface).

        In an OSGi context, an instance should be retrieved using the service registry. It will be registered under the ValidatorFactoryMakerService interface.

        Returns:
        returns a new ValidatorFactoryMaker

        Obtains a new instance of a Validator with the given identifier
        Specified by:
        newValidator in interface ValidatorFactoryMakerService
        Parameters:
